ygData.subject: Re: Footloose and fancy free...
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone told me that they had seen mesh boots, but I never have.  In fact, it s the only mesh piece that I am missing.  Has anyone else seen or heard of mesh
ygData.messageBody:
Someone told me that they had seen mesh boots, but I never have. In
fact, it's the only mesh piece that I am missing. Has anyone else seen
or heard of mesh boots?

---
Adam


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Aaron Braunstein [SMTP:aaron_spam@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 4:07 PM
> To: eq-monks@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Footloose and fancy free...
>
> From: Aaron Braunstein <aaron_spam@...>
>
> Well, I've been on a big armor-upgrade kick lately, when it
> occurred to me that I am still walking around in the same ol' footwear
> that
> I've had since... well, forever. It's like walking around in the beat
> up
> blue Keds you had back in 2nd grade. Seeing as there is no 'mesh
> boots' or
> anything of that ilk, I was wondering what was out there that was
> monk-friendly (i.e. low weight). AC is obviouly desireable, although
> anything that could offer other bonuses (stat increase, resistances,
> etc.)
> would be wonderful.
> Suggestions, advices, personal experiences appreciated...
>
> --
> Aaron Braunstein
> Pacific Data Management, Inc.
>
> <aaron_braunstein@...>
>
>
